FuncDef: The display pos-trunk command displays the configurations of a POS-Trunk interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a POS-Trunk interface.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 127.

Examples: Operate status: up     Number Of Up Port In Trunk: 2
ExtraInfo: To view the configurations of a POS-Trunk interface, run the display pos-trunk command.
